Terminal (This name is probably taken) was standing in the ship. That's it,=
 just standing. He was looking straight off at a wall, completely oblivious=
 to all of the happenings so far. He was all white, but some parts were a d=
ifferent off kind of white. Despite this odd staring, he does indeed have a=
 good brain. That's it. Well, at least for now...
